modName: Hi-res texture for the steel sword
summary: An improved, hi-res (2048x2048) texture for Skyrim\'s steel sword (and Skyforge Steel Sword).
descriptionHtml:
An improved, hi-res (2048x2048) texture for Skyrim\'s steel sword (and Skyforge Steel Sword).

Based on the great leather handle created by killaliljoo (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=57).

As usual, extract the ZIP file in Skyrim/data.
author: Agar42
